Package entity

Class PricingScheme

java.lang.Object
entity.PricingScheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PricingScheme extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains all the information of a pricing scheme

      Parameters:
      date - the date of the ticket
      cinemaClass - the cinema class of the ticket
      ageGroup - the age group of the ticket
      movieType - the movie type of the ticket
      seatType - the seat type of the ticket
      Returns:
      the price of the ticket
